overview: Meet Doctor Perrin, a prominent and respected doctor whose life has become a little too routine. That all changes though, when a wounded circus manager comes into Dr. Perrin’s care and tells him a secret before dying. The secret? That women have another pleasure point the Q spot, which is not located in the vagina, but in the ass. The Q spot however, is much different in that even in the most sexually frigid women, it causes an explosion of pleasure. And so, Dr. Perrin finds himself involved in a whirlwind of sexual escapades because of his newfound knowledge of the mysteriously arousing Q spot. How lucky can one Doctor get? Watch for yourself and find out…
title: Q Spot
